issue.title: [R] Optionally use distro package in linuxlibs.R
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10530](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10530). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`distro` is now on CRAN. The script should prefer the package version if present, which may be updated/patched apart from `arrow`.
